message.body: Any progress made :( :(
Dad isnt answering his phone
Aw shit. Not a good sign.
So bummed it happened now. Its good it didnt happen on the way up but was really looking forward to coming. I will let you know when I talk to him
Me too! I was just telling hunter how hAppy I was that we were gonna hang out. Would have been way worse if you were on 95
Well, if a miracle happens, I'm ready for you!
P
Okay. I should hear from him by 6
(1/3) I dont know if I should go over to dads and see whats up or just go home... I called twice but he didnt answer. I know its really cold outside, he probabl
(2/3) y couldnt look at it today. I understand. Its brutally cold and he only has a woodstove in the shop. I think I will go home and wait for him to let me k
He said he will try to look at it this weekend. Sorry man, rain check though!
Aw man!!! It's so cold here too let's wait for a warmer weekend!
Ok
I just emailed you a video I found in ilianas tablet. Lol. This is what she does in her room wjen im not paying attention...
I can't see it!
Bummer. It was really funny
The jeep dad let me borrow wont start
Smdh... sometimes ya just feel like crying!!
What!?!
Oh nooo
It's Friday at least. Stay strong!
Yeah. Its whatev.... hanging at the house with iliana. Repair guy is coming to fix my garbage disposal and im going to wash clothes.
Did you take the day off?
Yeah.
3 day weekend! It's supposed to snow here tmw
(1/2) Yeah, here too. Maybe everything is happening for the best anyways. My car is pretty crappy in snow. I think im going to order delivery!!!! I havent don
(2/2) e that in like a year!
Yes! It's the best!
Netflix, delivery amd laundry.... sounds like a good day to me!
Omg the best!
